name: Guardian Angels
description:
Enemies are coming! Command magical girls to defend the city!

This game was created for Magical Girl Game Jam #3.

How to Play
  • Drag & drop a magical girl into a red area to assign the corresponding task.
    • Defend: Fights against enemies.
    • Invite: Invites a new magical girl to the team.
    • Rest: Heals her health.
    • Earn: Earns money.
  • Click an upgrade button at the top right corner of a red area to upgrade the task.
  • Each magical girl costs 12 money each wave.
